 
{{Client function}}
{{New feature/item|3.0130|1.3.0|4097|
This function edit's the properties of a specific [[/sound.md|sound]].
}}

==Syntax== 
<syntaxhighlight lang="lua">bool setSoundProperties(element sound, float fSampleRate, float fTempo, float fPitch, bool bReverse )</syntaxhighlight> 
{{OOP||[[/sound.md|sound]]:setProperties||getSoundProperties}}
===Required Arguments=== 
*'''sound:''' a [[/sound.md|sound]] [[/element.md|element]] that is created using [[/playSound.md|playSound]] or [[/playSound3D.md|playSound3D]]

*'''fSampleRate:''' a [[/float.md|float]] that defines the new sound's [http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Sampling_rate sample rate]

*'''fTempo:''' a [[/float.md|float]] that defines the new sound [http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Tempo tempo]

*'''fPitch:''' a [[/float.md|float]] that defines the new sound [http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Pitch_%28music%29 pitch]

*'''bReverse:''' a [[/boolean.md|boolean]] representing whether the sound will be reversed or not.

===Returns===
Returns ''true'' if the properties sucessfully set, ''false'' otherwise.

==Example== 
<section name="Client" class="client" show="true">
<syntaxhighlight lang="lua">
function editSongSound()
	local sound = playSound("song.wav", false) -- Play the file 'song.wav' and make it play only once
	setSoundProperties(sound, 48000.0, 128.00, 440.0, false) -- Set its samplerate to 48,000 Hz, tempo to 128.00, pitch to 440 Hz and not reversed
end
addEventHandler("onClientResourceStart", resourceRoot, editSongSound) -- Execute the function when the resource is started
</syntaxhighlight>
</section>
